approved_by: Panama Maritime Authority, Maritime Ships Security Department, Directorate General Of Merchant Marine
note: Confirms designation of CSOs for Truong Minh International Joint Stock Company. Emphasizes compliance with ISPS Code (Part A, Section 11 and Part B, Section 13.1) and MSC.1/Circ. 1390 for high-risk areas. Stresses consistency between ISSC, CSR, and DOC certificates to avoid PSC detentions.
